sw-list-price-field.helpTextListPriceGross: List prices indicate a discounted product. List prices are denoted as the "original" price which is crossed out and coloured in red. The actual and discounted price will be displayed alongside in the default text colour.
sw-list-price-field.helpTextRegulationPriceGross: You must fill in this field if you want to advertise price reductions in your store in the EU. Such information should be verifiable by the customers. Therefore, in the case of price reductions, in addition to the price reduction on the current price, the lowest price of the goods in the last 30 days before the price reduction must also be indicated. This is prescribed in Art. 6 a of Directive 98/6/EC.

sw-inheritance-warning.infoTextInheritedField: {moduleName} has inherited fields. Meaning that as long as the inherited state is active the content will be inherited. Inherited fields can be unlinked by clicking the link symbol. Clicking the symbol again will set the inherited state back.

sw-license-violation.title: Extension warning
sw-license-violation.alertText: We have detected a license violation for at least one of your extensions in this installation. To fix the license violation and avoid legal consequences, book a subscription or buy/rent the extension (according to inflicted violation type). You do not use the extension anymore? Then delete it via the "Delete extension permanently" button or via My Extensions. If none of these measures are taken, shuwei AG reserves the right to charge penalty fees for any license violation.
sw-license-violation.messageDeleteConfirm: Do you want to delete the extension "{pluginName}" completely?
sw-license-violation.checkboxMessage: I have taken notice of this message and eventually accruing consequences.

move-shop-permanently.name: Migrate apps to new domain
move-shop-permanently.description: Make your apps use the new domain instead of the old domain. This will assign all apps and app data to your new domain and remove the assignment from the old domain.

reinstall-apps.name: Copy apps to current domain
reinstall-apps.description: If you want to keep your apps working on both domains, this re-installs all apps on your new domain. Note: App data on your old domain will still be available, non-free apps may require additional charges for each domain.

uninstall-apps.name: Uninstall apps
uninstall-apps.description: Keeps app data on old domain and uninstalls all apps from the new domain.

sw-app-app-url-changed-modal.title: Domain change detected
sw-app-app-url-changed-modal.explanationHeader: We have noticed a change in your shop domain.
sw-app-app-url-changed-modal.explanation: Installed apps are still connected with the old domain and won't work with the new domain. There are three options from here to proceed.
sw-app-app-url-changed-modal.error: Error while changing domain for apps

sw-app-wrong-app-url-modal.title: Wrongly configured APP_URL
sw-app-wrong-app-url-modal.explanationHeader: Error with the connection to your extensions.
sw-app-wrong-app-url-modal.explanation: Extensions are not able to establish a connection to your shop, due to a wrong configuration in your system.
sw-app-wrong-app-url-modal.textGetSupport: Try contacting your hoster to get support.

sw-ai-copilot-warning.text: AI responses can be inaccurate or misleading.

sw-settings-usage-data-intro.title: Usage data
sw-settings-usage-data-intro.headline: Improving Shuwei collectively
sw-settings-usage-data-intro.description: Help us build better products and services by allowing us to collect usage data from your Shuwei Administration. Using the latest privacy preserving techniques, we make sure that the collected data cannot be associated with you or your shop. We do not collect any customer information.

sw-settings-usage-data-modal.alertText: This setting will affect all Shuwei Administration users. You can change it at any time in {settings-path}
